name: Super Blast Ride
description:
Super Blast Ride

Test the new super weapon, it is so powerful that will blast you away.
Endless game. Use an oversize weapon to fight a zombie horde.

The weapon is so big that the player can't walk.  And so powerful that shooting the gun moves the player. 

Stop shooting charges the weapon power, the next shoot will be a blast. 

[Controls]

 Use the  Left Mouse Click to shoot to the mouse direction.

Hold the mouse click to shoot like a machine gun for precision. Or release the mouse button, it will allow the weapon to charge, the next shoot is a blast. (Useful for the fire pits)

[Matching]

Clicking shoots the weapon and moves the player.

 Stop shooting allows the player to charge the weapon and jump hazards. 

The breakable boxes are used as normal blockers, but gives the player the choice to turn the weapon and destroy it or go around. 

[Platform]

Windows  build is at the zip. 

Also it can be played at  https://darkon76.github.io/ (a little bit laggy at the start)
